hr.caellian.flow.conversion

Class ConversionManager<T extends Converter>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.caellian.flow.conversion.ConversionManager<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Converter type subclass supported by Conversion Manager.

    public abstract class ConversionManager<T extends Converter>
extends java.lang.Object
    Conversion Manager allows conversion between different Flux types.

    Conversion process has to be registered separately for every conversion. This system prevents unintentional conversion between Flux types that shouldn't work together.

    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • getConverterMap

        protected abstract java.util.Map<Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>,T> getConverterMap()
        Using this method allows Conversion Managers to dictate which map data format they want to use. This allows multiple Conversion Managers to use the same map, to load map from disk or download it from internet and to perform other forms of transfer or map manipulation.
        Returns:
        access to converter map stored in this manager.

      • register

        public boolean register(T converter)
        This method will register a power converter safely without forcing it's registration and usage.
        Parameters:
        converter - converter to register.
        Returns:
        true if converter wasn't previously registered and was successfully registered, false otherwise.

      • register

        @Deprecated
public abstract boolean register(T powerUnitConverter,
                                              boolean force)
        Deprecated. 
        This method will register a power converter safely allowing you to force it's registration and usage.

        There is no guarantee that implementation of this function will or can respect force parameter.

        Parameters:
        powerUnitConverter - converter to register.
        force - true to force registration.
        Returns:
        true if converter wasn't previously registered and was successfully registered, false otherwise.

      • converterAvailable

        public boolean converterAvailable(java.lang.String from,
                                  java.lang.String to)
        Parameters:
        from - ID of input flux type.
        to - ID of output flux type.
        Returns:
        true if a direct conversion function for input and output flux IDs is available, false otherwise.

      • converterAvailable

        public boolean converterAvailable(java.lang.String from,
                                  java.lang.String to,
                                  int maxSteps)
        Parameters:
        from - ID of input flux type.
        to - ID of output flux type.
        maxSteps - number of steps to find indirect conversion function within.
        Returns:
        true if an indirect conversion function for input and output flux IDs is available within defined number of steps, false otherwise.

      • getConverter

        public T getConverter(java.lang.String from,
                      java.lang.String to)
        Parameters:
        from - ID of input flux type.
        to - ID of output flux type.
        Returns:
        direct converter form input to output flux type, null otherwise.

      • getConverter

        public T getConverter(java.lang.String from,
                      java.lang.String to,
                      int maxSteps)
        Parameters:
        from - ID of input flux type.
        to - ID of output flux type.
        maxSteps - number of steps to find indirect conversion function within.
        Returns:
        indirect converter if an indirect conversion function for input and output flux IDs is available within defined number of steps, null otherwise.
